definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: That is the tousle-haired island baker collectinghis flour.
sentences.chinese: 那个头发蓬乱的岛上面包师傅正在点收他的面粉。

sentences.english: Today, I saw the baker preparing a very interesting kind of bread.
sentences.chinese: 今天我看到面包师傅在准备一个很有趣的面包。

sentences.english: When does the baker follow his trade?
sentences.chinese: 面包师傅什么时候营业？

sentences.english: He is indeed a good baker , be able to compete with baker from Hollyland bakery.
sentences.chinese: 有点像好利来面包师傅烘烤的，他的手艺还不错。

sentences.english: The baker took the loaves out of the oven.
sentences.chinese: 面包师傅从烤箱取出一条条的面包。

sentences.english: The baker has carried on business here for years.
sentences.chinese: 这个面包师傅在这里做生意已经好多年了。

sentences.english: The artist, like the baker , should be paid for his work.
sentences.chinese: 艺术家，像面包师傅，应该被支付他的工作费用。

sentences.english: That is the tousle-haired island baker collecting his flour.
sentences.chinese: 那个头发蓬乱的岛上面包师傅正在点收他的面粉。

sentences.english: Please get me a loaf of bread from the nearest baker.
sentences.chinese: 请帮我到最近的面包师傅那买一条面包。

sentences.english: He is the best baker in town.
sentences.chinese: 他是镇了最好的面包师傅。

sentences.english: Being a baker requires you to know all about flour and ovens.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个面包师傅要求您知道所有面粉和烤箱。

sentences.english: The baker bakes bread every day.

definition: suncake (small round cake made with flaky pastry and a maltose filling, originally from Taichung, Taiwan)
